name: Pop The Bubble (vendolis)
description:
This is my little game for the Kenny GameJam 2022. 
Click the bubbles before they collide with bubbles of another color or pop by themselves. Only then do you get points. 
If the bubble is too small when you pop it, you will get negative points.
Bubbles of the same color will join and grow the larger bubble.

I had some problems with the theme and only really came up with this. But, apart from it being bare bones, it was kind of fun.  

Known Issue:

  • Sometimes it does not register clicks when you have too many bubbles on the screen, or they are too big.
  • The game gets stuck after one playthrough and has an error. you will need to reload when the level is over.
